items.typeLine: Alchemist's Silver Flask of the Dove
explicitMods: 23% reduced Duration
25% increased effect
15% increased Attack Speed during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.typeLine: Alchemist's Bismuth Flask of the Order
explicitMods: 27% reduced Duration
25% increased effect
craftedMods: Regenerate 3% of Life per second during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
8% increased Attack Speed
+51 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that hit enemies, causing them to gain bonuses while you have resonance of all three elements, and to grant resonance of elements other than the highest one in a hit. There is a maximum of 50 Resonance for each Element. Cannot support triggered skills, instant skills, orb skills, brands, skills with a reservation, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
explicitMods:
Hits with Supported Skills for which the highest Damage Type is Elemental cause you to gain 25 Resonance of other Elements per second for 2 seconds
Lose 5 Resonance per second of each Element you are not gaining
Supported Skills deal 3% more Elemental Damage per 5 of lowest Resonance
Supported Skills penetrate 16% Elemental Resistances while each Resonance is at least 25
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.typeLine: Alchemist's Amethyst Flask of the Rainbow
explicitMods: 25% reduced Duration
25% increased effect
37% additional Elemental Resistances during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.typeLine: Alchemist's Quicksilver Flask of the Cheetah
explicitMods: 27% reduced Duration
25% increased effect
13% increased Movement Speed during Effect

items.name: Quill Rain
explicitMods: +11 to Dexterity
100% increased Physical Damage
100% increased Attack Speed
Grants 2 Mana per Enemy Hit
67% increased Projectile Speed
+27 to Accuracy Rating
30% less Damage
flavourText: "The rain of a thousand quills that whittle
present into past, life into death."

items.name: Bottled Faith
explicitMods: 27% reduced Duration
Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius
Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies 10% increased Damage taken to Enemies
116% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A tourniquet for the soul, squeezing ethereal into physical.
